text: @JRubinBlogger trump failed, testing for COVID-19 has been abysmal. Lacking guidance & support from the White House, governors scrambling to obtain ventilators & personal protective equipment for frontline workers. Federal capability & responsibility nonexistent - trump failed, Americans died.
